Articles.Content:
Old KSP player here, tried KSP2 but not for me at the moment, so I'm going back to KSP1 :-) 

What's the best combination to get the best visuals currently? Terrain, Clouds, Planets, Space etc. 

For visual/graphics I'm thinking of;

Galaxies Unbound (extra planets etc)
Singularity
Volumetric Clouds (beta) (Scatterer included)

What else should I pick?

Thanks! ;-)

I run Parallax 2.0, TUFX, Eve Redux, Scatterer, and Astronomers Visual Pack with 8K textures. Throw in some Real Plume, Waterfall and you're off to the races

 

Probably one or two I'm missing but, those are the big ones.

On 3/2/2023 at 2:51 PM, TheRustedShackleford said:

I run Parallax 2.0, TUFX, Eve Redux, Scatterer, and Astronomers Visual Pack with 8K textures. Throw in some Real Plume, Waterfall and you're off to the races

 

Probably one or two I'm missing but, those are the big ones.

thanks!
